artifacts.name: Lobo's Chain
artifacts.lore: The Main Man's weapon of choice. Considering Lobo's vast experience with violence and weapons, his preference for the hooked chain is a weighty endorsement.

+175 Health +15 Attack Damage

artifacts.name: Diana's Bracers
artifacts.lore: A symbol of their past oppression, Amazon warriors wear these indestructible metal bracers as a reminder of their struggle and triumph.

artifacts.name: Kryptonian War Armor
artifacts.lore: Developed during Krypton's last historical epoch, it was designed for survival in harsh environments as well as for war. Lex Luthor gained possession of it, using the suit to fight Superman.

artifacts.name: Marauder Shield
artifacts.lore: A defensive Monitor artifact designed for efficacy against the corrupted and altered creatures found in the urban jungles of the Lost Sectors.

artifacts.name: Spear of Destiny
artifacts.lore: An ancient Roman spear with a storied history, it is said to protect those that wield it from assault, especially magical attacks.

artifacts.name: Atlantean Royal Seal
artifacts.lore: This seal is emblazoned with a rune that is used by the royalty of Atlantis as their family crest.

artifacts.name: Mega Rod
artifacts.lore: Based on the same Apokoliptian technology used to construct Boom Tubes, it is a versatile weapon used as a hand-to-hand weapon, for energy blasts, and an aid to transportation.

artifacts.name: Atlantis Gambit
artifacts.lore: An artifact of ancient Atlantis, it can accelerate the recovery of other artifacts and provide a powerful offensive edge to the wielder and allies.

artifacts.name: Olympus Gambit
artifacts.lore: A symbol of the Olympian gods' favor, it can accelerate the recovery of new artifacts and provide a significant defensive bonus to the bearer and allies.

artifacts.name: Coda Blade
artifacts.lore: The Clef Blade is the traditional weapon of choice of the Coda Sisterhood. Primarily used in duels and rituals, some of their most dangerous assassins use it in their deadly work.

artifacts.name: Ruby of Life
artifacts.lore: Created thousands of years ago, over the ages the ruby fragmented and the pieces scattered. A single piece was enough to grant magical power to the man who would become Sargon the Sorcerer.

artifacts.name: Helm of Fate
artifacts.lore: Regarded by some as the most powerful magical artifact the world has ever known. The Helm of Fate holds immense arcane power, which is only amplified when worn by an adept and powerful magician.

levels.description: +10 Power Damage +10 Power Armor
+30 Power Damage +20 Power Armor
+60 Power Damage +30 Power Armor Mystic Surge Activate to grant Power Damage equal to 30% of your Bonus Power Armor for 10s (90s Cooldown).

actives.name: Mystic Surge
actives.description: Activate to grant Power Damage equal to 30% of your Bonus Power Armor for 10s (90s Cooldown).

artifacts.name: Eclipso's Diamond
artifacts.lore: This gem is also known as the Heart of Darkness, and is said to have an evil, sentient mind trapped within it. Stories say that this mind can possess those that hold the gem if they act in anger.

levels.description: +30 Power Damage +15% Power Lifesteal
+60 Power Damage +30% Power Lifesteal Desperate Power Gain +1.5 Power Damage for every 2% Health you are missing (Max 45 Power Damage).

passives.name: Desperate Power
passives.description: Gain +1.5 Power Damage for every 2% Health you are missing (Max 45 Power Damage).

artifacts.name: Entropy Aegis
artifacts.lore: Designed by Darkseid himself, combining Apokoliptian technology with an Imperiex probe. Powered from entropy the suit could absorb and nullify energy. Considered the apex of Apokoliptian dark military science.

levels.description: +100 Health +15 Power Armor
+200 Health +30 Power Armor
+250 Health +40 Power Armor Skill Block 1 Grants a Skill Shield that prevents the damage and effects of the next enemy skill (90s cooldown).

passives.name: Skill Block 1
passives.description: Grants a Skill Shield that prevents the damage and effects of the next enemy skill (90s cooldown).

artifacts.name: Metallo's Heart
artifacts.lore: Barely kept alive by alien technology, Metallo (aka John Corben) urgently needed a replacement heart for the one destroyed by Brainiac. The only replacement compatible with his cybernetics was a kryptonite power source.

levels.description: +100 Health +15 Attack Armor
+200 Health +30 Attack Armor

passives.description: -20% Attack Speed for all nearby enemy Champions.

artifacts.name: Batman's Utility Belt
artifacts.lore: An artifact of nearly mythical versatility, Batman's Utility Belt can be a vital tool or unexpected edge in almost any situation… if the wearer has the knowledge and wits to use it effectively.

artifacts.name: Qward Gambit
artifacts.lore: The Weaponers of Qward are renowned for their brutally, efficient weapons. This gambit is no different, as it makes the abilities of the wielder and those nearby more powerful.

artifacts.name: Nil Ring
artifacts.lore: Easily constructed by the Artifact Foundry, this ring invigorates those that wear it. However, due to its simple construction, it cannot be improved.

artifacts.name: Nil Weapon
artifacts.lore: Developed by Nix using recovered Monitor technology, it is relatively easy to recreate using the Foundry.

artifacts.name: The Starheart
artifacts.lore: Billions of years ago, the Guardians of the Universe condensed the majority of the wild, chaotic magical energy that infused the universe into this device.

artifacts.name: Marauder Ring
artifacts.lore: Designed to combat the corrupted creatures in the Lost Sectors, this ring enables its wearer to recover their strength and remain in the urban jungles longer.

artifacts.name: Psi-Scimitar
artifacts.lore: At rest, this mystical artifact appears to be little more than an ornate yet bladeless hilt. In the hands of one with the blood of a warrior, the hilt produces a blade of flaming energy.

artifacts.name: Joe Chill's Revolver
artifacts.lore: The firearm used in a mugging gone wrong that claimed the lives of Thomas and Martha Wayne.

artifacts.lore: Developed by Nix using recovered Monitor technology, this protective artifact can be quick produced using the Foundry, but offers no avenues for improvement.

artifacts.name: Atomic Axe
artifacts.lore: A weapon of indeterminate origin, the Atomic Axe's most distinctive feature is the ability to slice through virtually anything.

artifacts.name: Doctor Destiny's Dreamstone
artifacts.lore: Believed to be the creation of the villainous Doctor Destiny, the gem allowed him to alter reality using the fabric of dreams. A staggeringly powerful magical artifact and extremely dangerous in the wrong hands, A.R.G.U.S. claims it is secure in their magical storage facility: the Black Room.

artifacts.name: Soultaker Katana
artifacts.lore: Forged centuries ago, every person to have wielded Soultaker has been driven mad. The sword sometimes takes the souls of those it kills, entrapping them and allowing them to communicate with the wielder.

artifacts.name: Suit of Sorrows
artifacts.lore: A cursed suit of armor that dates back to the Crusades. It was given to Batman by Talia al Ghul. While it made him stronger and faster, he grew concerned that it was corrupting his judgment, and so put it aside.

artifacts.name: Velocity 9 Implants
artifacts.lore: An implant that continually doses its user with the superspeed drug Velocity 9. Developed by Vandal Savage to undercut a rival's drug empire, the formula has been refined to remove the worst side effects.

artifacts.name: Cosmic Staff
artifacts.lore: Invented by Ted Knight, the original Starman, this device allows its users to manipulate energy fields for offensive and defensive purposes.

artifacts.name: Deathstroke's Claymore
artifacts.lore: A master of many weapons, Slade Wilson (aka Deathstroke) still favors this massive sword made with a near-invulnerable alloy of titanium, vanadium, and depleted promethium.

actives.description: Activate to deal 5% of your target's maximum Health as Attack Damage (Max 600 vs creatures and drones), and increase further damage you deal to them by 5% for 3s (120s Cooldown).

artifacts.name: Eye of Ekron
artifacts.lore: Thought to be the disembodied eye of an enormous Green Lantern, this artifact can be used like a Power Ring by those with sufficient willpower.

artifacts.name: Claw of Horus
artifacts.lore: A gauntlet made from Nth metal recovered from Prince Khufu's downed Thanagarian space ship.

artifacts.name: Abin Sur's Lantern
artifacts.lore: The Power Battery of Abin Sur, one of the greatest and most unorthodox Green Lanterns. At the time of his death, he recruited Hal Jordan to replace him.

artifacts.name: The Book of Eternity
artifacts.lore: Written by Merlin, this book is said to contain all the complete history of the universe, from the distant past to the far-flung future.

levels.description: +40 Power Damage Arcane 1 +15% Power Penetration.

passives.name: Arcane 1
passives.description: +15% Power Penetration.

levels.description: +50 Power Damage Arcane 2 +35% Power Penetration.

passives.name: Arcane 2
passives.description: +35% Power Penetration.

artifacts.name: Oa Gambit
artifacts.lore: The Guardians of the Universe have created many powerful objects throughout the millennia of influence. This device can accelerate the recovery of new artifacts and will lower the defenses of enemies near the bearer.

levels.description: +6 Power Damage +6 Power Armor

+15 Power Damage +15 Power Armor Investment When sharing Drone credits with one or more allies, the overall value is increased by 20%. As with all credit sharing, this bonus is distributed equally between yourself and nearby allies. Investments do not stack with other Investments, the maximum bonus is 20%.

passives.description: -10 Power Armor for all nearby enemies.

artifacts.name: Sword of Beowulf
artifacts.lore: A legendary and magical sword once wielded by the hero Beowulf. It may only be drawn by those those pure of heart--whether pure good or pure evil.

levels.description: +15 Attack Damage +10 Power Armor
+25 Attack Damage +20 Power Armor Response Shield 1 When you take Power Damage that puts you below 30% Health, gain a Shield that lasts 5s and blocks 250 Power Damage (60s Cooldown).

artifacts.name: Amulet of Isis
artifacts.lore: Given to Adrianna Tomaz by Black Adam, it led to her transformation into Isis when she tapped into its ancient power.

levels.description: +75 Health +75 Will
+5 Move Speed +100 Health +100 Will +10% Cooldown Reduction
+5 Move Speed +200 Health +200 Will +10% Cooldown Reduction Mercury's Gift 1 Grant a 25% Move Speed buff to all nearby allies for 2s (60s Cooldown).

actives.name: Mercury's Gift 1
actives.description: Grant a 25% Move Speed buff to all nearby allies for 2s (60s Cooldown).

artifacts.name: Rip Hunter's Time Pack
artifacts.lore: Rip Hunter's self-invented Time Packs allowed the wearer to travel through time. As an artifact, it has an influence on the bearer's relative experience of time.

levels.description: +12 Attack Damage
+20 Attack Damage +5% Cooldown Reduction
+35 Attack Damage +10% Cooldown Reduction

+50 Attack Damage +15% Cooldown Reduction Time Anchor Activate once to record a position. Activate again within 5s to return to that position (90s Cooldown). If you are stunned or interrupted before the second activation, your current anchor is destroyed and this skill goes on cooldown.

actives.name: Time Anchor
actives.description: Activate once to record a position. Activate again within 5s to return to that position (90s Cooldown). If you are stunned or interrupted before the second activation, your current anchor is destroyed and this skill goes on cooldown.

artifacts.name: Blue Scarab
artifacts.lore: This Blue Scarab is a genetically-engineered weapon created by the Reach, an alien race bent on conquest. Its obedience programming was damaged long ago and it now acts on its own free will.

levels.description: +10% Attack Speed +20 Power Damage
+20% Attack Speed +30 Power Damage Charged Attack Your Basic Attacks deal bonus Power Damage equal to 10 + 10% of your Power Damage.

passives.name: Charged Attack
passives.description: Your Basic Attacks deal bonus Power Damage equal to 10 + 10% of your Power Damage.

artifacts.name: Ra's al Ghul's Robe
artifacts.lore: Worn by Ra's al Ghul after numerous uses of Lazarus Pits, over centuries of use it has absorbed its liquids and retains some of its properties.

levels.description: +35 Attack Armor +25 Power Armor

+45 Attack Armor +30 Power Armor Lazarus Effect 1 If you would fall to 0 Health, you instead gain a shield worth 250 + 85/level, your Attack Armor is set to 45 and your Power Armor is set to 35, and you become Suppressed. If the shield is unbroken after 4s, the remaining shield is converted to Health and you regain 50% Will (4 minute Cooldown).

passives.name: Lazarus Effect 1
passives.description: If you would fall to 0 Health, you instead gain a shield worth 250 + 85/level, your Attack Armor is set to 45 and your Power Armor is set to 35, and you become Suppressed. If the shield is unbroken after 4s, the remaining shield is converted to Health and you regain 50% Will (4 minute Cooldown).

artifacts.name: Gorilla Grodd's Helmet
artifacts.lore: A helmet developed by Grodd himself, it amplifies his own psionic abilities to place other beings under his mental control.

levels.description: +125 Will

actives.name: Psychic Shield
actives.description: Applies a Shield that blocks 40 damage (40 + 7/Level + 10% (0) Bonus Will) to a target for 3s. While the shield lasts, the target is immune to Disables. (60s Cooldown).

artifacts.name: Cheetah's Claw
artifacts.lore: A broken claw from Cheetah, a woman possessed by the Goddess of the Hunt. To be wounded by this monstrous creature can cause a kind of lycanthropic transformation and drive the victim to beastial rage.

levels.description: +8% Attack Speed
+3% Attack Lifesteal +15% Attack Speed
+6% Attack Lifesteal +25% Attack Speed
+12% Attack Lifesteal +30% Attack Speed Frenzy Activate to gain 50% Attack Speed for 4s (60s Cooldown).

actives.name: Frenzy
actives.description: Activate to gain 50% Attack Speed for 4s (60s Cooldown).

artifacts.name: Phantom Stranger's Necklace
artifacts.lore: Thirty pieces of silver form the cursed necklace that is the Phantom Stranger's burden to bear. Sentenced to walk the earth by the Wizards' Council for his ancient crime, he is condemned to forever be a stranger to man.

levels.description: +5 Attack Armor +5 Power Armor

+10 Attack Armor +5 Power Armor Armor Collector +.5 Attack and Power Armor when you collect a coin (max 20 Attack and Power Armor, lose 50% of your stacks on death). Coins give double stacks on Gotham Heights.

passives.description: +.5 Attack and Power Armor when you collect a coin (max 20 Attack and Power Armor, lose 50% of your stacks on death). Coins give double stacks on Gotham Heights.

artifacts.name: Neron's Contract
artifacts.lore: Stained with drippings from a demon blood taper and containing terms trading the signer's desires for their immortal soul, a contract with the 'Lord of Lies' rarely benefits the bargainer in the long term.

levels.description: +10 Attack Armor +10 Power Damage
+15 Attack Armor +25 Power Damage
+20 Attack Armor +50 Power Damage
+30 Attack Armor +60 Power Damage Blood Bargain Activate to gain a massive Shield that blocks 100 damage (100 + 50/Level + 150% (0) Bonus Power Damage) and be Suppressed for 3s (120s Cooldown).

actives.name: Blood Bargain
actives.description: Activate to gain a massive Shield that blocks 100 damage (100 + 50/Level + 150% (0) Bonus Power Damage) and be Suppressed for 3s (120s Cooldown).

artifacts.name: Promethium Mace
artifacts.lore: A weapon made of depleted promethium, an alloy comprised of promethium,  titanium and vanadium. This alloy was originally discovered by Dayton Industries and is nearly indestructible.

levels.description: +7 Attack Damage
+14 Attack Damage
+25 Attack Damage
+30 Attack Damage Refundable You can salvage this artifact for its full value.

passives.name: Refundable
passives.description: You can salvage this artifact for its full value.

artifacts.name: Shade's Cane
artifacts.lore: The immortal English gentleman Richard Swift, also known as the Shade, carried this cane throughout his exploits. After an occult ritual gone wrong, The Shade could manipulate shadows; due to its long exposure to him, the cane seems to swallow light and leaves its wielder uneasy.

levels.description: +9 Attack Damage +9 Power Damage Darkness Manipulation 1 Your Basic Attacks and skill uses grant 1 Attack Damage and 1 Power Damage for 7s (max 7 stacks).

passives.name: Darkness Manipulation 1
passives.description: Your Basic Attacks and skill uses grant 1 Attack Damage and 1 Power Damage for 7s (max 7 stacks).

levels.description: Desperate Endurance Falling below 50% Health, gain 10% Attack and Power Lifesteal until you do not take or deal damage for 5s (30s Cooldown). Desperate Endurance Falling below 50% Health, gain 10% Attack and Power Lifesteal until you do not take or deal damage for 5s (30s Cooldown).

passives.name: Darkness Manipulation 3

artifacts.name: Steel's Breastplate
artifacts.lore: Originally working for the government's 'Steel Soldier' program, Dr. John Henry Irons left the project protesting the mistreatment of Superman. He later developed his own prototype armor which he used to defeat the 'Metal 0' suit he himself designed.

levels.description: +125 Will +10 Attack Armor
+100 Health +200 Will +20 Attack Armor
+200 Health +300 Will +30 Attack Armor Iron Will Activate to redirect 20% of damage taken to your Will for the next 5s (60s Cooldown).

actives.name: Iron Will
actives.description: Activate to redirect 20% of damage taken to your Will for the next 5s (60s Cooldown).

artifacts.name: Radion Shard
artifacts.lore: A substance deadly to the New Gods, this rare property has led to its use as a weapon by and against these powerful beings.

levels.description: +12 Power Damage
+25 Power Damage
+45 Power Damage
+50 Power Damage Refundable You can salvage this artifact for its full value.

passives.name: Refundable
passives.description: You can salvage this artifact for its full value.

artifacts.name: Pandora's Box
artifacts.lore: Once containing the Seven Deadly Sins, it is said that only one who is 'strongest' or 'darkest' of heart can open it. Even without those evil spirits, it remains a powerful and coveted artifact.

levels.description: +15% Will Regeneration +15 Power Damage
+5 Move Speed +15% Will Regeneration +30 Power Damage
+5 Move Speed +35% Will Regeneration +50 Power Damage +5% Cooldown Reduction

+5 Move Speed +50% Will Regeneration +60 Power Damage +10% Cooldown Reduction Blood Spirit 1 Release a restless spirit to seek out the nearest enemy Champion, traveling up to 3,500. If the spirit reaches them, the Champion will be Slowed by 20% and Revealed for 3s. Holds 1 charge(s) which regenerate every 60s.

actives.name: Blood Spirit 1
actives.description: Release a restless spirit to seek out the nearest enemy Champion, traveling up to 3,500. If the spirit reaches them, the Champion will be Slowed by 20% and Revealed for 3s. Holds 1 charge(s) which regenerate every 60s.

artifacts.name: Fatality's Energy Lance
artifacts.lore: Trained under the Warlords of Okaara, Fatality once favored an energy lance as her weapon of choice. While her violet power ring exceeds the capabilities of that weapon, she still creates constructs in battle which harken back to the weapon.

levels.description: +20 Power Damage
+30 Power Damage +5% Cooldown Reduction
+60 Power Damage +10% Cooldown Reduction

+85 Power Damage +10% Cooldown Reduction Energy Blast Activate to fire a blast of energy that deals damage to the first enemy Champion hit equal to 15% of their current Health as Power Damage, and increases further damage you deal to them by 10% for 5s (30s Cooldown).

actives.name: Energy Blast
actives.description: Activate to fire a blast of energy that deals damage to the first enemy Champion hit equal to 15% of their current Health as Power Damage, and increases further damage you deal to them by 10% for 5s (30s Cooldown).

artifacts.name: Zeiss Goggles
artifacts.lore: A high-tech tool with a terrible price. By wiring these goggles directly into his frontal lobe, Zeiss gained enhanced senses and the ability to analyze and anticipate his enemy's actions, giving his attacks deadly accuracy.

levels.description: +7 Attack Damage +7% Attack Speed
+15 Attack Damage +15% Attack Speed
+25 Attack Damage +25% Attack Speed

+30 Attack Damage +30% Attack Speed Enhanced Aim You gain 8 stacks of Enhanced Aim each time you hit with a basic attack and 4 stacks every second. When you reach 100 stacks, your next basic against an enemy Champion attack will deal 100 + 25% Bonus Attack Damage as Power Damage. After, Enhanced Aim stacks will reset to 10% of your Bonus Attack Damage.

passives.name: Enhanced Aim
passives.description: You gain 8 stacks of Enhanced Aim each time you hit with a basic attack and 4 stacks every second. When you reach 100 stacks, your next basic against an enemy Champion attack will deal 100 + 25% Bonus Attack Damage as Power Damage. After, Enhanced Aim stacks will reset to 10% of your Bonus Attack Damage.

artifacts.name: Deadshot's Visor
artifacts.lore: One of the devices worn by the assassin Deadshot to ensure he never misses his target. This visor can magnify objects at great distances and provides real-time telemetry on environmental conditions. This data helps guarantee that its wearer's attacks hit their mark.

levels.description: +75 Will +10 Attack Damage +8% Attack Speed
+150 Will +25 Attack Damage +15% Attack Speed

+300 Will +40 Attack Damage +30% Attack Speed Intensity When toggled on, Basic Attacks and single-target skills cost an additional 4% Current Will and deal bonus Attack Damage equal to 150% of the Will consumed. When toggled off, Basic Attacks restore 0.5% Max Will on hit.

actives.name: Intensity
actives.description: When toggled on, Basic Attacks and single-target skills cost an additional 4% Current Will and deal bonus Attack Damage equal to 150% of the Will consumed. When toggled off, Basic Attacks restore 0.5% Max Will on hit.

artifacts.name: Huntress' Crossbow
artifacts.lore: The name Huntress is used by different heroes in different universes, and in each incarnation the fast, silent, and deadly crossbow is a favored and effective weapon.

levels.description: +20 Attack Damage +15% Attack Speed
+40 Attack Damage +20% Attack Speed
+50 Attack Damage +30% Attack Speed Slayer Your Basic Attacks deal 5% of your target's current Health as bonus Attack Damage. (Max 100 vs creatures and drones)

passives.description: Your Basic Attacks deal 5% of your target's current Health as bonus Attack Damage. (Max 100 vs creatures and drones)

artifacts.name: The Logoz
artifacts.lore: The inner aspect of the Spectre, the Logoz is thought to provide a direct conduit to the Presence and a source of incredible power.

levels.description: +75 Will +5 Power Damage

+75 Will +10 Power Damage Power Damage Collector +.75 Power Damage and .25% Cooldown Reduction when you collect a coin (max 30 Power Damage and 10% Cooldown Reduction, lose 50% of your stacks on death). Coins give double stacks on Gotham Heights.

passives.name: Power Damage Collector
passives.description: +.75 Power Damage and .25% Cooldown Reduction when you collect a coin (max 30 Power Damage and 10% Cooldown Reduction, lose 50% of your stacks on death). Coins give double stacks on Gotham Heights.

artifacts.name: Fragment of Mogo
artifacts.lore: A sentient planet, Mogo was the Green Lantern Corp member responsible for locating new candidates and dispatching power rings. Destroyed by John Stewart in the War of the Green Lanterns, Stewart later worked with Fatality to allow Mogo's fragments to come together and reform.

levels.description: +100 Health +15 Attack Armor
+200 Health +30 Attack Armor

+250 Health +40 Attack Armor Burning Core Activate to deal damage over time to all nearby enemies. Deals 20 Power Damage (20 + 4% (0) Bonus Health) and then 10 Power Damage (10 + 2% (0) Bonus Health) each second decaying to 5 Power Damage (5 + 1% (0) Bonus Health) over 10s (90s Cooldown).

actives.name: Burning Core
actives.description: Activate to deal damage over time to all nearby enemies. Deals 20 Power Damage (20 + 4% (0) Bonus Health) and then 10 Power Damage (10 + 2% (0) Bonus Health) each second decaying to 5 Power Damage (5 + 1% (0) Bonus Health) over 10s (90s Cooldown).

artifacts.name: The Medusa Mask
artifacts.lore: A mask once worn by the villain Psycho-Pirate. Those that wear the mask can inspire any emotion they desire in those they look on, from love to hate, courage to cowardice, or joy to terror. Before his death, Psycho-Pirate's ability to manipulate emotions made him a particularly loathed villain.

levels.description: +10 Health Regen per 10s +25% Will Regeneration
+12 Health Regen per 10s +30% Will Regeneration Medisys On leveling up, regain 75 Health and Will over 20s.

passives.name: Medisys
passives.description: On leveling up, regain 75 Health and Will over 20s.

passives.name: Medisys
passives.description: On leveling up, regain 75 Health and Will over 20s.

levels.description: Medisys On leveling up, regain 75 Health and Will over 20s. +40% Will Regeneration Medisys On leveling up, regain 75 Health and Will over 20s. Psychosis If used on an enemy, applies Wounding and deals 100 Power Damage plus 5% of the enemy's maximum health as Power Damage over 5s. If used on an ally, it heals for 100 immediately plus 10% of the ally's maximum health over 5s (120s Cooldown).

passives.name: Medisys
passives.description: On leveling up, regain 75 Health and Will over 20s.

actives.name: Psychosis
actives.description: If used on an enemy, applies Wounding and deals 100 Power Damage plus 5% of the enemy's maximum health as Power Damage over 5s. If used on an ally, it heals for 100 immediately plus 10% of the ally's maximum health over 5s (120s Cooldown).

artifacts.name: Hawkman's Harness
artifacts.lore: A harness worn by Hawkman to which artificial wings are attached. Both the harness and the wings are comprised of Nth metal. The unique properties of this metal give the harness' wearer the ability to fly. The harness itself is tremendously resilient, again thanks to this remarkable metal.

levels.description: +65 Health
+125 Health
+225 Health
+275 Health Refundable You can salvage this artifact for its full value.

passives.name: Refundable
passives.description: You can salvage this artifact for its full value.

artifacts.name: Bleed Portal
artifacts.lore: An experimental device derived from recored Monitor technology. It is capable of accessing the bleed to create a tunnel between two points in space. The connection is unstable, collapsing violently and destroying whatever objects it was anchored to.

levels.description: Bleed Tunneling Target an environmental object to create an entrance. Target a second environmental object to create an exit and open a connected portal for 60s (120s Cooldown). Allies can right click on the entrance to travel to the exit.

actives.name: Bleed Tunneling
actives.description: Target an environmental object to create an entrance. Target a second environmental object to create an exit and open a connected portal for 60s (120s Cooldown). Allies can right click on the entrance to travel to the exit.

artifacts.name: Speed Force Battery
artifacts.lore: A battery designed by Steel that is capable of absorbing and containing small amounts of the Speed Force.

levels.description: Blink Jump Activate to immediately blink to a location up to 600 away (20s Cooldown). Cannot be used for 6s after taking damage.

actives.name: Blink Jump
actives.description: Activate to immediately blink to a location up to 600 away (20s Cooldown). Cannot be used for 6s after taking damage.

artifacts.name: Modular Tektite Vial
artifacts.lore: A vial containing microscopic, self-replicating machines capable of repairing and strengthening biological organisms.

levels.description: Modular Tektite Vial Restores 50 Health and 50 Will over 15s. Each use consumes 1 of 1 charges. Charges are refreshed when returning to base.

artifacts.name: Modular Health Vial
artifacts.lore: Designed for portability and concentrated effect, the Health Vial can restore health to its user over a short period of time, but it is consumed in the process.

artifacts.name: Modular Will Vial
artifacts.lore: A light and portable Will Vial that can restore expended Will to the user over a short period of time, consuming the Vial in the process.

artifacts.name: Cosmic Belt
artifacts.lore: An early Ted Knight invention, inspired by the technology that empowered the Cosmic Rod used by the original Starman. Several heroes have worn it to great effect and to perform great deeds. It confers many benefits to those who use it, from flight to enhanced strength, some of which vary from person to person.

artifacts.name: Mirror Master's Prism
artifacts.lore: The focusing element of the Mirror Master's iconic pistol, its optical properties are not fully understood. While Mirror Master's powers are believed to extend to all reflective surfaces and do not appear to require the use of this tool, the prism itself still exhibits unusual effects on reflection, diffusion, and refraction of light.

artifacts.name: Booster Gold's Power Suit™
artifacts.lore:
We interrupt this lore entry for a message from the Booster Gold merchandising department.

Good news Booster-maniacs: Thanks to advances in Legion Time Travel Shipping, you can own a part of future history. Yes, you can own the magnificence, splendor, and raw heroism of Booster Gold's Power Suit. Being a hero means being able to stand between harm and the helpless. For that, you need endurance and Booster Gold's Power Suit gives you heaps of it. You also need to keep the pressure on the bad guys. Guess what? Booster Gold's Power Suit has technology far beyond the today's most cutting edge to help you use your skills more frequently. But that's not all! You also get Booster Gold's (patent pre-pending) Shield Boost. Most importantly, Real Heroes know how to lead, and to help you do that, Real Hero will reduce the impact of those terrible Turrets. Be a Hero. Buy Booster Gold's Power Suit today.

levels.description: +100 Health +20 Attack Armor
